title: roasted lamb with mashed potatoes and mint sauce
ingredients: 2kg/4lb 8oz shoulder of lamb, bone removed (you can ask your butcher to do this)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
500g/1lb 2oz carrots, peeled and cut into large chunks
500g/1lb 2oz turnips, peeled and cut into large chunks
1kg/2lb 4oz white potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
20g/¾oz mint leaves, picked and finely chopped
